trans-unit.resname: JOU·158 | Armory of Iroas | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Armory of Iroas
trans-unit.target: 伊洛安斯的兵械

trans-unit.resname: JOU·158 | Armory of Iroas | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.\nEquip {2}
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物攻击时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: JOU·158 | Armory of Iroas | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: From a distance the weapons look pristine, but in fact they are tarnished and dented, each as unique as the champion who carried it to battle.
trans-unit.target: 这些武器远看崭新无瑕，近看暗淡无光且凹痕累累，每一件武器都跟带它们上战场的战士同样独一无二。

trans-unit.resname: JOU·159 | Chariot of Victory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chariot of Victory
trans-unit.target: 胜利战车

trans-unit.resname: JOU·159 | Chariot of Victory | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has first strike, trample, and haste.\nEquip {1}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有先攻，践踏，与敏捷异能。 佩带{1}

trans-unit.resname: JOU·159 | Chariot of Victory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The greatest heroes are the first to stand, the first to take up arms, and the first to meet the enemy.
trans-unit.target: 身先受命、身先备战、身先赴敌，如此方为至勇英雄。

trans-unit.resname: JOU·160 | Deserter's Quarters | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deserter's Quarters
trans-unit.target: 逃兵囚营

trans-unit.resname: JOU·160 | Deserter's Quarters | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.\n{6}, {T}: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as CARDNAME remains tapped.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择于你的重置步骤中不重置CARDNAME。 {6}，{T}：横置目标生物。只要CARDNAME持续被横置，该生物于其操控者的重置步骤中便不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: JOU·160 | Deserter's Quarters | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In Akros, the penalty for running from battle is one night's stay in the Deserter's Quarters.
trans-unit.target: 阿喀洛斯对不战而逃者的处罚是在逃兵囚营中禁闭一夜。

trans-unit.resname: JOU·161 | Gold-Forged Sentinel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.
trans-unit.target: 随诸神降福，任众生祈盼，仍无偏无倚。

trans-unit.target: 凯旋大厅

trans-unit.resname: JOU·162 | Hall of Triumph | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.\nCreatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种颜色。 由你操控的该色生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: JOU·162 | Hall of Triumph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Heroes act without thought of glory or reward. Accolades are a consequence, not a goal.
trans-unit.target: 英雄不是因为荣耀或奖励才出手的。获得荣誉是自然结果，而非目标。
